front.title: BGP/MPLS IP VPN Data Center Interconnect

abstract.t: This document discusses two categories of inter-connections of BGP/MPLS IP VPN and Data Center (DC) overlay networks. In the first category, DC overlay virtual network is built with BGP/MPLS IP VPN (IP VPN) technologies, and the inter-connection of IP VPN in the DC either to IP VPN in other DCs or to IP VPN in the WAN enables end-to- end IP VPN connectivity. In the second category, DC overlay network uses non IP VPN overlay technologies, and the inter-connection of any overlay virtual network in the DC to IP VPN in the WAN provides end user connectivity through stitching of different overlay technologies.
